name: treatment of residues, MSWI, aluminium in car shredder residue, residual material landfill | residues, MSWI, aluminium in car shredder residue | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/28091/documentation

The process represents the treatment of controlled landfilling in residual material landfill of a waste (residues) that is exclusively produced in another waste treatment. Residues are a by-product that is generated during the municipal solid waste incineration (MSWI) of 'aluminium in car shredder residue'. Recommended use of this dataset: to be used within the specific chain of treatments for 'aluminium in car shredder residue'. Share of biogenic carbon in the sludge: 0%.

The activity starts with the waste being available at the gate of the treatment facility. Collection and transportation of the waste to the treatment plant is not included.

The activity ends with the waste being treated and waste-specific emissions from the landfill are released to water (short-term emissions to river water and long-term emissions to ground water).
category: E:Water supply; sewerage, waste management and remediation activities/38:Waste collection, treatment and disposal activities; materials recovery/382:Waste treatment and disposal/3822:Treatment and disposal of hazardous waste

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Modelling parameters affecting the treatment technology are not specific to this geography.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Residual material landfill for polluted, inorganic waste with base seal and leachate collection system (landfill type C). Recultivation after closure.

exchanges.description: main reference product of this activity (supply of disposal service).
